name: Horrifying Experiments? Demo
description:
This is an early demo, prepared for Nordic Game Indie Sensation 2016.

It contains a limited amount of weapons, characters, modes and environments compared to the full game.

Play together with your friends in this funny, entertaining and action-packed game. Aim to defeat the Test Ticklers and their numerous Test-Arenas, in their giant Test-Tickle-Lab, to eventually uncover the truth behind these "Horrifying Experiments?".

The game is primarily intended to be played with a controller, so the keyboard controls aren't totally in place just yet.
